mapper.update: update a407.group set max = #{max}, edate = #{edate}, groupName = #{groupName}, groupDesc = #{groupDesc}, img = #{img}, category = #{category}, region = #{region} where gId = #{gId}
mapper.select: select * from a407.group where groupName like CONCAT('%', #{word}, "%")
select * from a407.group where groupDesc like CONCAT('%', #{word}, "%")
select * from a407.group where category like CONCAT('%', #{word}, "%")
select * from a407.group where region like CONCAT('%', #{word}, "%")
mapper.insert: insert into a407.group (email, max, sdate, edate, groupname, groupdesc, category, onoff, region, img) values (#{email},#{max},now(),#{edate},#{groupname},#{groupdesc},#{category},#{onoff},#{region},#{img})
mapper.select: select mId, email, gId from a407.member where gId = #{gId}
